* *paru -S kbdlight macbook-lighter*
* *systemctl enable --now macbook-lighter*
* *macbook-light-ambient*
- last ones auto-adjusts on ambient light


=== Commands ===
* *macbook-lighter-kbd --max*
- set keyboard backlight to max
* *macbook-lighter-kbd --min*
- close backlight
* *macbook-light-kbd -i _<Num>_*
- increases backlight by _<Num>_
* *macbook-light-kbd -d _<Num>_*
- decreases backlight by _<Num>_

- max: 255, min: 0
